Contributing to Raysect
-----------------------

Pull requests are welcome and encouraged. When submitting code please be aware of the following conditions:

1) Code quality:

Please ensure code fits in with the existing code style of the repository and that, where possible, unit tests and documentation are provided.

2) Copyright, attribution and licensing:

All contributed code will be licensed under Raysect's license (see LICENSE.txt).

Please be careful when using third party code. The licensing and copyright conditions for any third party code must be compatible with Raysect copyright and license terms.
